scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Christ on the central cross, his body emaciated and head bowed. To his left, another figure is crucified, and to his right, a soldier stands guard. Below the cross, on the left, stand the Virgin Mary, veiled and with hands clasped in sorrow, and another grieving woman. On the right, a group of soldiers in armor are present, one with hands clasped in prayer or contemplation. The setting is outdoors, with a stylized sun or flower motif visible at the base of the right cross. The inscription above Christ's head reads 'I.N.R.I.'
